title: (x) Porcelain script - Rage Italic {Tiff}
content:
Hi—

I’m a n00b here, so I hope I’m doing this right ;)

I’m looking for this font. Here’s a sample...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029023735im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PorcelinSample2.jpg)

Thank you :)

All My Best,  
Jeffrey

 [‹ Harvard Business Review font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029023735/http:/typophile.com/node/18176 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Molecules slanted compact sans with indents - Inverserif (Concorde) {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029023735/http:/typophile.com/node/18175 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rlinsurf

comments.content: You’re doing it right except that next time you should give your thread a more specific name, like Porcelain Script or something to distinguish it from the others.

Sorry... I will do that next time.

Rage Italic... Thank you!

Where would I find that?

All My Best,  
Jeffrey

NM. Found it...

Thanks again :)

All My Best,  
Jeffrey
